ygData.subject: Re: Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl
ygData.msgSnippet: ... because you ... your worn candle ... And the club ... Hokey, I figured out what I was doing wrong. I needed to right click on Fehril to pull up a training
ygData.messageBody:
> The only reason you wouldn't be able to equip your newbie club is
because you
> already have something in your primary hand slot. Did you put
your worn candle
> in that slot?
>
> You don't need to train any points to be able to equip a weapon.
And the club
> uses 1 Hand Blunt skill, not Hand-to-Hand
>
> Sulamwen
> Warder of <Fate's Forge>
> E'ci
Hokey, I figured out what I was doing wrong. I needed to right click
on Fehril to pull up a training screen that I didn't even know to
look for. I'll be right clicking on npcs now. I've upped my single
and and double hand blunt weapon skills. I was trying to drop my
club into a hand slot instead of an equiped weapon slot. Thanks to
everyone for their help. I'm heading back to the crater now. I have
some revenge to catch up on. Rock hoppers and skeletons prepare to
meet your doom! I'm kind of getting into this. G

Edward
